      • except

        protected java.lang.Throwable except

      • groupDNprefix

        public static java.lang.String groupDNprefix
        LookUpGroupmembersDN : specialized LookupCondition returning list of dn of entries found For each entry that is a group insert 'groupdn:' in front of the dn found . a previous connection to an LDAP (or VDS) server must be done using doConnect(...) . This function will help detecting 'nested groups'

      • LookUpCondition

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Object> LookUpCondition(java.lang.String dn,
                                                        java.lang.String filter,
                                                        int scope,
                                                        java.lang.String outAttr)
        Lookup : get the values of an attribute from entries based on search criteria. a previous connection to an LDAP (or VDS) server must be done using doConnect(...)
        Parameters:
        dn - - dn defining the starting point to look from
        filter - - valid ldap search filter syntax example : (&(orderid=3)(productid=3))
        Scope - --- scope - one, sub or base
        outAttr - name of the output attribute
        Returns:
        values of the output Attribute in a List , or null if no match found

      • LookUpCondition

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Object> LookUpCondition(java.lang.String dn,

                                                        int ldapLimit,
                                                        boolean distinct)
        Lookup : get the values of an attribute from entries based on search criteria. a previous connection to an LDAP (or VDS) server must be done using doConnect(...)
        Parameters:
        dn - - dn defining the starting point to look from
        filter - - valid ldap search filter syntax example : (&(orderid=3)(productid=3))
        Scope - --- scope - one, sub or base
        outAttr - name of the output attribute
        ldapLimit - --- ldap limit - 0 returns all entries
        Returns:
        values of the output Attribute in a List , or null if no match found
